review: I will admit something... I get incredibly annoyed with over complicated technical gadgets. Love to use them, can read directions and set them up if I have to, but if the manufacturer makes it user friendly and simple I am a passionate fan for life. That is certainly the case with Amazon Fire. Here's all I had to do. 1) open the box 2) put the small black box next to my TV 3) plug the charger into a wall socket, 4) plug in an HDMI cable one side in the TV and the other in the Fire box. 5) turn the TV on.  Presto, a world of Movies and TV shows at my disposal. The voice button on the remote works flawlessly. Really love this - only downside is that I have not done any chores in the house this week because I'm a little obsessed with how much there is to watch. Balance :)
